text:
@realDonaldTrump This is democracy??

You know it’s the Top 1% backing Biden.

You’ll see Hillary back as VP.

CoronaVirus is rigged against you.

Be safe Sir. We know what’s going.

#TrumpSupporter
#Trump2020
